name: La Bionda
description:
'''La Bionda''' were an Italian [[disco]] duo consisting of siblings Carmelo (1949â€“2022) and Michelangelo La Bionda (born 1952). They are considered among the pioneers of the [[Italo disco]] music genre.

The siblings were born in [[Ramacca]], [[Sicily]] and moved to [[Milan]], [[Lombardy]] in 1954.
